sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-row>
            <v-col
                v-for="plan in plans"
                :key="plan.id"
                sm="6"
                md="3">
                <PlanCard :plan="plan"></PlanCard>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
</template>
<script>
import PlanCard from '@/components/PlanCard'
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
    name: 'HomePlans',
    components: {
        PlanCard,
    },
    data() {
    return {
      plans: [],
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getPlans()
    document.title = 'Home | Digital Wave'
  },
  methods: {
    async getPlans(){
        await axios
            .get('api/v1/plans/')
            .then(response => {
                this.plans = response.data
            })
            .catch(error =>{
                console.log(error)
            })
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style lang="">
    
</style>
